verses.text: Afterward he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me to the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, and \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w posts|strong="H0352"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w* on the one \w side|strong="H6311"\w*, and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w* on the other \w side|strong="H6311"\w*, \add which was\add* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*.

And the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \add was\add* \w ten|strong="H6235"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w sides|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \add were\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on the one side, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* on the other side: and he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.\f + \fr 41.2 \ft door: or, entrance\f*

Then \w went|strong="H0935"\w* he \w inward|strong="H6441"\w*, and \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w post|strong="H0352"\w* of the \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

So he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w*, \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto me, This \add is\add* the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*.

After he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of \add every\add* side \w chamber|strong="H6763"\w*, \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*.

And the \w side|strong="H6763"\w* \w chambers|strong="H6763"\w* \add were\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w*, one over \w another|strong="H6763"\w*, and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* in \w order|strong="H6471"\w*; and they \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* which \add was\add* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for the side \w chambers|strong="H6763"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, that they might have \w hold|strong="H0270"\w*, but they had not \w hold|strong="H0270"\w* in the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*.\f + \fr 41.6 \ft one…: Heb. side chamber over side chamber\f*\f + \fr 41.6 \ft thirty…: or, three and thirty times, or, foot\f*\f + \fr 41.6 \ft have hold: Heb. be holden\f*

And \add there was\add* an \w enlarging|strong="H7337"\w*, and a winding \w about|strong="H5437"\w* still \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* to the side \w chambers|strong="H6763"\w*: for the winding \w about|strong="H4141"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* went still \w upward|strong="H4605"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: therefore the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add was still\add* \w upward|strong="H4605"\w*, and so \w increased|strong="H5927"\w* \add from\add* the \w lowest|strong="H8481"\w* \add chamber\add* to the \w highest|strong="H5945"\w* by the \w midst|strong="H8484"\w*.\f + \fr 41.7 \ft there…: Heb. it was made broader, and went round\f*

I \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* also the \w height|strong="H1363"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*: the \w foundations|strong="H4328"\w* of the side \w chambers|strong="H6763"\w* \add were\add* a \w full|strong="H4393"\w* \w reed|strong="H7070"\w* of \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w great|strong="H0679"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

The \w thickness|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, which \add was\add* for the side \w chamber|strong="H6763"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*: and \add that\add* which \add was\add* \w left|strong="H3240"\w* \add was\add* the \w place|strong="H1004"\w* of the side \w chambers|strong="H6763"\w* that \add were\add* \w within|strong="H1004"\w*.

And between the \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* \add was\add* the \w wideness|strong="H7341"\w* of \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* on every \w side|strong="H5439"\w*.

And the \w doors|strong="H6607"\w* of the side \w chambers|strong="H6763"\w* \add were\add* toward \add the place that was\add* \w left|strong="H3240"\w*, \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0259"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w* toward the \w south|strong="H1864"\w*: and the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* that was \w left|strong="H3240"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

Now the \w building|strong="H1146"\w* that \add was\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the separate \w place|strong="H1508"\w* at the \w end|strong="H6285"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* the \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \add was\add* \w seventy|strong="H7657"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*; and the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w building|strong="H1146"\w* \add was\add* \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w thick|strong="H7341"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof \w ninety|strong="H8673"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

So he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*; and the separate \w place|strong="H1508"\w*, and the \w building|strong="H1140"\w*, with the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* thereof, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*;

Also the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* of the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and of the separate \w place|strong="H1508"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*.

And he \w measured|strong="H4058"\w* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of the \w building|strong="H1146"\w* over \w against|strong="H6440"\w* the separate \w place|strong="H1508"\w* which \add was\add* \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* it, and the \w galleries|strong="H0862"\w* thereof on the one side and on the other side, an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*, with the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, and the \w porches|strong="H0197"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*;\f + \fr 41.15 \ft galleries: or, several walks, or, walks with pillars\f*

The door \w posts|strong="H5592"\w*, and the \w narrow|strong="H0331"\w* \w windows|strong="H2474"\w*, and the \w galleries|strong="H0862"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* on their three \w stories|strong="H7969"\w*, over \w against|strong="H5048"\w* the \w door|strong="H5592"\w*, \w cieled|strong="H7824"\w* with \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*, and from the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* up to the \w windows|strong="H2474"\w*, and the \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* \add were\add* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w*;\f + \fr 41.16 \ft cieled…: Heb. cieling of wood\f*\f + \fr 41.16 \ft and from…: or, and the ground unto the windows\f*

To that above the \w door|strong="H6607"\w*, even unto the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, and by all the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* \w within|strong="H6442"\w* and \w without|strong="H2435"\w*, by \w measure|strong="H4060"\w*.\f + \fr 41.17 \ft measure: Heb. measures\f*

And \add it was\add* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* with \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w*, so that a palm \w tree|strong="H8561"\w* \add was\add* between a \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* and a \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w*; and \add every\add* \w cherub|strong="H3742"\w* had \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w*;

So that the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of a \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add was\add* toward the palm \w tree|strong="H8561"\w* on the one side, and the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of a young \w lion|strong="H3715"\w* toward the palm \w tree|strong="H8561"\w* on the other side: \add it was\add* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* through all the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

From the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w* unto above the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* \add were\add* \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*, and \add on\add* the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*.

The \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* \add were\add* \w squared|strong="H7251"\w*, \add and\add* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*; the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* \add of the one\add* as the \w appearance|strong="H4758"\w* \add of the other\add*.\f + \fr 41.21 \ft posts: Heb. post\f*

The \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* \add was\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H1364"\w*, and the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w*; and the \w corners|strong="H4740"\w* thereof, and the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w* thereof, \add were\add* of \w wood|strong="H6086"\w*: and he \w said|strong="H1696"\w* unto me, This \add is\add* the \w table|strong="H7979"\w* that \add is\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
And the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w* and the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w* had \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w*.

And the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* had \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w leaves|strong="H1817"\w* \add apiece\add*, \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w turning|strong="H4142"\w* \w leaves|strong="H1817"\w*; \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add leaves\add* for the \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w door|strong="H1817"\w*, and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w leaves|strong="H1817"\w* for the \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \add door\add*.

And \add there were\add* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* on them, on the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of the \w temple|strong="H1964"\w*, \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w*, like as \add were\add* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* upon the \w walls|strong="H7023"\w*; and \add there were\add* \w thick|strong="H5646"\w* \w planks|strong="H6086"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*.

And \add there were\add* \w narrow|strong="H0331"\w* \w windows|strong="H2474"\w* and palm \w trees|strong="H8561"\w* on the one side and on the other side, on the \w sides|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w*, and \add upon\add* the side \w chambers|strong="H6763"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and thick \w planks|strong="H5646"\w*.
